import React, { useState } from 'react' const AddUser = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", userName: "", emailId: "" }) const { firstName, lastName, userName, emailId } = user const onInputChange = (e) => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.firstName]: e.target.value }); } return (
